Vinnie Caldas Tattoo Artist, photo taken by Nhuri Bashir

After owning my own shops in Brazil and Bermuda, and a few guest artist spots in Europe, I am now based in Amsterdam and Utrecht in the Netherlands, working with the BodyCult team.

I commit to a high standard of hygiene, with all relevant infection control certificates. As well, I always ensure to provide professional and friendly customer service and consistent high quality pieces.

I am always open to exploring guest artist spots as I want to collaborate with other artists and build my portfolio. I bring respect and openness to learn from each other.


Vinnie Caldas — Body Canvas Tattoo
